channel.title: Really quick question please help me!

item.title: Really quick question please help me!
item.dc:creator: @sone14 sone14
item.description:
@sone14 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I, post:2, topic:352731”]Client files:

Usually GUI, EGUI, or client class.

Look for one of those.

And if it’s renamed, look for jFrame.[/quote]

where do i place it is it the server ip??

like it says something like server ip than the ip in quote marks do i delete it and place it in there?

"
System.out.println(“Connecting”);
//launchURL(“PKPlanet”);
Serverip = “5.66.52.126”; <----place it in here?
sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(Serverip));

		initUI();   " is what it is in  a gui txt file
